description:
“Productivity depends on the knowledge you have of the tools used.”

Do you feel that the development tools you use are heavy? Do you think
that they make you less productive? Do you want to have maximum
productivity without lifting your hands from the keyboard?

If so, this talk is for you.

In this talk, I will show what are the tools I use every day in software
development at OnTruck and how you can integrate

the text editor, vim the terminal multiplexer, tmux the HTTP client,
httpie and the json processor, jq

to get a very productive development environment, all running on a
simple terminal.
title: Developing in a black hole: vim, tmux, httpie and jq
